QuestData.Title: A Turtle's Invitation
QuestData.Description:
You have been most helpful $r. Please visit me and the other Tortollans along the Jeweled Coast.
We'll discuss soup and other pressing matters.
QuestData.LogDescription: Visit Maokka and the other Tortollans at the Jeweled Coast.
QuestData.RewardText: You're arrival is most timely. We could use your help!
